channel.title: Evolution pk - eco server -
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/s47yvl.jpg[/img]
[U][B]Owner/Coder: ELMO![/B][/U]
Forums/Website: [url=http://evolutionpk.b1.jcink.com/index.php?]http://evolutionpk.b1.jcink.com/index.php?[/url] Play Now: [url=http://evolutionpk.b1.jcink.com/index.php?act=Pages&pid=3]http://evolutionpk.b1.jcink.com/index.php?act=Pages&pid=3[/url]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2wqwqo7.png[/img]
Evolution PK is an all in one server. We provide a good, stable economy, smooth combat/pk system, and fully operational bosses. The based used for the server is Deathlypkz V2. Although the base already has a substantial amount of content included, I've added some stuff already and I intend on adding a whole lot more. This is not my first server I've ran, but this is probably the best one so far just because I am far more experience than I used to be (Not saying I'm great in any way trolls). I hope you enjoy the experience as much as I have!:)
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/rbwb2r.png[/img]
[U][B]Fixed/Added/Deleted[/B][/U]
Storm of Armadyl, along with the sprite, runes, and staff Fixed item equips Fixed models Added new models for Torva, Pernix, and Bandos Added Polypore Staff with correct stats Fixed player shops Fixed all custom item stats and equip slots Added Ganodermic drops to Nex Added/Edited teleports Fixed skillcape shop
[U][B]Upcoming Updates[/B][/U]
Ganodermic Beasts with drops Polypore Spell Vote Point System (mySQL) Donator Points System (mySQL) Team PK Based System More Bosses More NPC Clipping More Bug Fixes More Donator Zone Benefits
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24w97uv.png[/img]
[U][B]Donator Shop[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/x55ymf.png[/img] [U][B]Custom Items[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/211455f.png[/img] [U][B]Teleport Interfaces[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1425tes.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/200dyq1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ng4z9k.jpg[/img]
Not Shown In Pictures Nomad Minigame/Boss Angry Gobline Minigame/Boss Strykeworms (Desert, Jungle, & Ice) Storm of Armadyl Spell *WORKING 100%* Donator Island

item.title: Evolution pk - eco server -
item.dc:creator: @kasoy1994 kasoy1994
item.description:
@kasoy1994 wrote:

Owner/Coder: ELMO!

Forums/Website: http://evolutionpk.b1.jcink.com/index.php?
Play Now: http://evolutionpk.b1.jcink.com/index.php?act=Pages&pid=3

Evolution PK is an all in one server. We provide a good, stable economy, smooth combat/pk system, and fully operational bosses. The based used for the server is Deathlypkz V2. Although the base already has a substantial amount of content included, I’ve added some stuff already and I intend on adding a whole lot more. This is not my first server I’ve ran, but this is probably the best one so far just because I am far more experience than I used to be (Not saying I’m great in any way trolls). I hope you enjoy the experience as much as I have!

Fixed/Added/Deleted

Storm of Armadyl, along with the sprite, runes, and staff
Fixed item equips
Fixed models
Added new models for Torva, Pernix, and Bandos
Added Polypore Staff with correct stats
Fixed player shops
Fixed all custom item stats and equip slots
Added Ganodermic drops to Nex
Added/Edited teleports
Fixed skillcape shop

Upcoming Updates

Ganodermic Beasts with drops
Polypore Spell
Vote Point System (mySQL)
Donator Points System (mySQL)
Team PK Based System
More Bosses
More NPC Clipping
More Bug Fixes
More Donator Zone Benefits

Donator Shop

Custom Items

Teleport Interfaces


Not Shown In Pictures
Nomad Minigame/Boss
Angry Gobline Minigame/Boss
Strykeworms (Desert, Jungle, & Ice)
Storm of Armadyl Spell WORKING 100%
Donator Island
